Object.Description: A well used chainmail now dusty and worn with age.
The work of a skilled armorer this armor will serve you well.
An opulent armor presented to heroes who have been recognized by royalty.
This plate was torn from the body of a demon warrior and now stands firm against the mad god.
A battleplate given to the ghouls of the tunnel to protect their overseer.
An armour given to the airborne protectors of the sky, the supple wings allow for swift movement and protection.
Armor that changes shape and material to adaptively defend the wearer against attacks.
A sturdy armor worn by the infamous Blackbeard, who through many battles drenched this armor in thick blood.
{equip.Mighty_felplate_armor_designed_for_the_most_powerful_of_dem}
An armor held together with the remains of fallen warriors.
The decaying remains of tridorno were used as threads to keep bind this cursed mail together.
Orcish battlemail known for its use in their wars with ogres.
Born from sin, always cursing those that stand before it.
Legends say when this armor is worn the users future will be full of prosperity.
A grim metal plate dented, scratched, and stained with war. An ever-present reminder of the cost of victory.
A deadly acid coats this armor, none dare strike you.
Incredibly heavy armor crafted of overlapping marble scales. The enchantments on this armor render it immune to wear.
A plate that burns brighter the closer it is to redemption.
An armor forged within the lava pools at the summoning point.
Forged from Magically Infused gold, this armor never loses shape.

Objects.Object:
Equipment
lofiObjSc 0x2b
7
7h An armor once drenched in a bloodbath of biblical proportion, the stains of the fallen souls are etched into it for eternity. IncrementStat IncrementStat IncrementStat IncrementStat

Object.Description: Can you hear nature calling for you? Can you feel the power flowing through you?
Made by a corrupted mage who would mass murder entire villages to steal their spirits ending in the creation of this armor, which holds the lives of every one of its tormented souls.
Made for the angelic warriors for fighting against demons, its holy powers make enemies shudder in its presence.
Shining silver platemail with cloth padding. Masterfully made to protect its user.
Masterfully forged elven armor worn by those in positions of power.
Golden etched plate armor used by angels in a desperate bid to slay Oryx before he was able to rise to power. Its construction makes it impossibly light for how well it protects.
Extremely heavy plate armor that protects its user with a shield of flame.
Worn by vicious warlords, this wrought iron platemail is often seen stained red with blood.
A well used robe now dusty and worn with age.
The work of a skilled seamstress this robe will serve you well.
An opulent robe presented to heroes who have been recognized by royalty.
This robe was torn from the body of a demon mage and now stands firm against the mad god.
A robe that will reflect light off into different colors.
A robe with magma flowing through its threads, even the shambling undead seek out it's warmth.
Robes worn by a sacrificial artificer, blood has stained its entire length.
Soaked in a concoction of poisons and acids, to make any predator disintegrate into thin air.
This coat effects the minds of anyone who gazes upon its user, removing any sense or reason from their very existence.
The robe of a young mage who lived and died by Granithia's side.
Precious robes of Oryx's servants, slowly but surely the user is cleansed of impurity.
Robes stolen from the Queen of hearts. She had once worn it for strolls throughout the castle.
You can feel the strength of Granithia embedded in this robe.
A robe worn from a sentient species from a universe far far away.
A robe made that seems to bend light within itself. It brings the eerie aura of the basement with it.
An heirloom within the dynastic line of the fire bearers.
An ethereal gown worn by one of the Eternal Celestials, their slumber eternal.
{equip.Only_cheaters_wear_this_robe.}
Used by many studying magic, for its unique power to control metal and machinery.
A garment forged within a blazing volcano hallowed by the fiery spirits residing within.
A dystopian robe worn by the shamans of the shadows to save themselves from the demons haunting them.
A robe worn by the highest interstellar beings, their raw strength fueled by the gracious orb found at the heart of the robe.
Shining brightly with pieces of emerald, this majestic robe invokes the users true potential.
Hardened over thousands of years with the sturdiest of stone, this robe that shatters any weapon it comes in contact with.
A robe made from spectral cloth and bone. Emits an aura that saps the life from anything around it.
A fire silk woven robe that whispers dark secrets in the mind of its user.
An island shaman's ritual robe. Grants the user enough magical might to call and direct storms.
An obsidian plated robe worn by Tok-za guildmasters, which are well known for their brutality.
While exceedingly powerful, this robe inflicts the user with a sense of detachment. Rarely worn by emissaries of mage guilds.
A well used hide now dusty and worn with age.
The work of a skilled armorer this armor will serve you well.
An opulent coat presented to heroes who have been recognized by royalty.
This armor was torn from the body of a demon operative and now stands firm against the mad god.
A hide draped in umbral essence given only to the commanders of the ghost ship.
Worn by the puppet master himself, you feel the eyes of countless soulless puppets upon you.
A light yet sturdy armor fashioned from the elder trees growing within the elemental ruin's garden.
This hide inflicts a sharp pain on those who try to defy its scaly wearer.
Forged from the ashes of those scorched by the flames of Satan.
Handcrafted leather armor sewn from the serpents resting inside the dreadnought's lair.
A gold adorned chainmail worn by the angelic protectors of the palace.
A fool's clothing, one that makes it easy to confuse luck for skill and pride for power.
A highly technological hide used to keep the wearer alive at all costs.
Legends say this armor has the soul of a genie inside, waiting to grant the user immense fortune.
A light armor made from the herbs within the garden of chaos, it grants greatly increased regenerative ability.
An all consuming force lingers around the armor, it emits strong feelings of unease.
A hide that screams like those subject to the aura of the zol.
Made from the bones of Izual, it can withstand incredible heat.
Skinned from the beast within the cave, a garment to be treasured.
Ancient sap flows through the rigid body of the armor acting as a solvent to keep the structure stable.
A marvelous hide strung together with the remains of the armors used by rogues and bandits to guard their stolen goods.
An armor so light that each attack seems to endlessly multiply upon impact.
First crafted by a talented blacksmith, who stole the scales of an ancient dragon, it is said to be highly sturdy while also revitalising its user.
Covered in magma from the depths of hell, searing anything that is inferior.
Tainted dragon leather dripping with toxins. Anything that touches this armor is brutally burned by the liquid.
Magically enchanted armor that protects the user. Powerful enough to deflect any spell.
Hide armor created during a ceremony. It was thought that it would one day pass down to the hands of a great conqueror.
Extravagant leather armor that twists the will of its user. Known to make those who wear it develop split personalities.
Virtually indestructible hide armor made with the scales of an emerald dragon.
A small silver ring, adorned with a misty ruby.
A ruby trinket, infused with a modest amount of power.
A golden ring inlaid with a glittering ruby, its presence strengthens your resolve.
A flawless ruby has been fused into magically honed obsidian, a fitting ring for a hero.
A crimson ring coated with the infernal rock of the abyssal depths.
A gleaming silver trinket taken from the corpse of a paladin within the Undead Lair.
A ring given to the dark knights of the underworld to signify their allegiance to the black king Oryx.
A powerful ring that crashed into many planets before being found.
A medallion used as a sort of anchor for the time traveling denizens of the Genisus.
An timeless amulet with permanent dull glow, warm to the touch yet not ablaze.
An unassuming ring adorned with an earthen pearl of exceeding purity from the soils of the chaotic garden.
A thunderous bracelet that seems to shine when in battle.
A cursed item that empowers the body, but denies its control.
A fallen star tied to a platinum chain, its glow twinkles in the night.
{equip.A_topaz_set_in_a_gold_ring.}
A golden forged ring holding the power of thunder within it's clear crystalline interior.
The thick rims and reinforced glass of this eyewear make it optimal for both the soldier and the scientist.
A pendant worn by doomages to symbolise his first victory.
An enormous power is trapped within this charm, when unleashed will release hells undying wrath.
A stone keepsake worn by Granithia, it grants the wearer a stone defense.
A trophy bearing evidence that one has bested each of the great beasts that dominate the catacombs.
A heavy gold amulet found at the depths of the ocean floor.
A belt stained with blood from the massacres of its previous owner.
A relic containing the first stone used to build his castle.
Taken from the corpse of Aldragine, the zol is now at your command.
A heart shaped container holding within it a fragment of the moon.
A tiny glass bauble that holds a small sample of the void entity, and bestows his gifts on the wearer.
The source of all of Drannol's power, this item should be feared.
Lost for centuries, it is said once found grants the user immense power, but at what price?
A circlet of light and dark showing their eternal coexistence within our universe.
A glamorous amber set within its steel ring. The amber is said to hold the remains of the garden of Eden.
The power of the night flows through the rings smeared sapphire seeking an escape.
A dense magnetic stone resides between the ends of the ring, it emits a dull hum.
A highly sought after treasure thought to have been lost during the medieval period.
A necklace known to cause its user to fall into fits of uncontrollable rage.
Perfectly formed, this gemstone greatly bolsters the might of its user.
A unique band of black iron encrusted with soulstones. It is said that this ring can cleanse the soul of its holder.
While appearing to be a simple carved totem tied with string, this necklace brings the wearer immense feelings of doubt and fear.
A shard of bloodstone turned into a necklace. Absorbs blood from fallen foes to be used in dark rituals.
Forged from the deadly waters of Zol, this ring slowly leaks a toxic liquid.
A cross embedded with bloodstone. Often carried by ritualistic cultists, it holds a sizable amount of magical power.
A ring worn by those with a connection to dark gods.
While appearing to be a simple carved totem tied with string, this necklace brings the wearer immense feelings of satisfaction and serenity.
An empowering bracelet used by the guardians of the shatters.
A well used sword now dusty and worn with age.
The work of a skilled blacksmith this sword will serve you well.
An opulent sword presented to heroes who have been recognized by royalty.
This sword was torn from the hands of a demon warrior and now stands firm against the mad god.
A magnificent blade coated in the ashes of those lost to the abyss.
A merciless blade wielded by Oryx's grand executioner.
A stone paladin's weapon used to vanquish those who would trespass on the hallowed threshold of their god.
A sharp curved sword, well aquainted with both blood and seafoam.
An axe with a glowing red edge, its incredibly sharp blade can slice through steel and flesh alike.
Crafted from the shattered crystal's fragments, a dull hum can be heard emanating from its core.
This rapier can pierce enemies at extreme speed and precision, that its victims are left in a pile of pieces.
A great barrier-sword of bridge sentinel, the sole companion of a lone protector.
A zol crystal sharpened to a deadly point lies at the end of this glaive.
A sword once wielded by a rampaging warlord lost in battle against his people's mutiny.
A demonic prince's enchanted blade, forged heavy with gems and gold, it seems a waste to wield in battle.
An axe so weighted with sin and sorrow that only a mortal with no soul could bear to lift it.
More of a slab of metal than a sword, this weapon has been known to cause its user to be unable to rest for days after a battle.
With a hilt of bone and a head of bloodstone, this axe can cleave through many foes at once.
A shining blade bestowed to those who've lived their life following the path of the righteous.
A well used katana now dusty and worn with age.
The work of a skilled blacksmith this katana will serve you well.
An opulent katana presented to heroes who have been recognized by royalty.
This katana was torn from the hands of an oni and now stands firm against the mad god.
A heavy blade that can only be wielded by those of true courage and strength.
A finely crafted katana that has grown heavy with the venom of numerous snakes it has slain.
A katana fashioned from the molten rock surrounding the crimson arena.
A parasitic organism resides in the blade of this katana, devouring all those it wounds.
Forged from the teeth within the serpent's maw, sharper than any blade known to man.
A katana wielded by spectres of the east, has been used to slay many ghosts and humans alike.
When stuck in an ongoing nightmare, sometimes it's best to just let go.
A blade so sharp it's able to tear through the coarse skin of Drannol himself.
A katana of unknown origin, its hellish strikes are both brutal and efficient.
A katana carried by a lone wanderer who promised himself he would arrive before the sunset...
Only ever held by the fearless Yukimura and hidden away from humanity to protect them from his eternal fury.
A scythe made from using nothing but obsidian ensuring it's durability after ever strike.
A grass bladed katana, dripping with vile acid. Eats through plate armor as if it was cloth.
A katana that passes hands whenever its immortal owner decides to willingly pass. While the blade itself does not bring immorality, its owners soon find the secrets to attain it.
The razor sharp blade of this katana is held steady by magics in its hilt. If the user is competent in the magic arts, one could shape the water how they please.
A well used staff now dusty and worn with age.
The work of a skilled enchantress this staff will serve you well.
An opulent staff presented to heroes who have been recognized by royalty.
This staff was torn from the hands of a demon mage and now stands firm against the mad god.
A trident capable of quelling storms and calling tides.
A simple stave capable of channelling the power of minerals hidden beneath the isle.
There are none who know the true origins of this staff, but its unmistakable aura of power is evident to all.
A volcanic gem floats above the frame of the staff, it emanates a fiery aura.
A staff adorned with an Onyx, capable of devouring both light and life.
So powerful, it has been seen to destroy everything in its path leaving nothing but destruction.
A staff that grants the user knowledge of the universe and more, but at a deadly cost.
{equip.An_imposing_golden_staff_of_tremendous_otherworldly_power.}
An anarchic staff that seeks to annihilate all life, it has stolen the visionary's soul and gained great power.
By harnessing the power of the blood moon, choke the flame of life.
A magnificent staff boasting all of the rarest gems recovered upon their countless adventures.
Charged by the heavens above.
Everyone needs a weapon during a fight, but not all weapons should be handed down to the mortals...
Arks of lightning bend through the sky at the command of this cosmic artifact.
Forbidden by mage guilds of old, this staff causes its targets to willingly embrace death.
Overwhelming power flows from within, cultivated over many decades.
A well used bow now dusty and worn with age.
The work of a skilled craftsman this bow will serve you well.
An opulent bow presented to heroes who have been recognized by royalty.
This bow was torn from the hands of a demon archer and now stands firm against the mad god.
A golden bow adorned with a misty sapphire that freezes the bolts it fires.
The spectral arrows launched from this bow pass through their target with incredible ease, as if they were already ghosts.
A bow fueled by the power of storms, lightning seems to crack with every arrow it fires.
The primary weapon of the megamoth's rangers.
A bow said to control a divine wind to guide the arrows it fires.
The long-range weapon of the ghostly crew, employed when the cannons were unavailable.
A crossbow made of incredibly dense metal, the heavy bolts it fires can crush skull's and break spines.
A bow fitted with a ruby centre, the crimson fletching of its arrows seem to guide every bolt to their target's heart.
A single arrow turns to an onslaught of volcanic rain.
An extravagant piece of technology that should have never came upon this world, it's power is too great...
A bow cast from the molten stingers of a hornets nest found within the blacksmiths home.
A scarlet bow hot to the touch as the boiling magma flows within it's ruby frame.
woopsie
An enchanted crossbow that draws moisture from the air to craft its ammunition. Its bolts detonate while inside of whatever they happen to hit, leading to horrible wounds.
A darksteel bow that sends those slain by its arrows to the deepest circles of the damned.
A harp-bow used by angels in a desperate bid to slay Oryx before he was able to rise to power. Only a few of these weapons remain, and they are exceedingly powerful.
A well used wand now dusty and worn with age.
The work of a skilled craftsman this wand will serve you well.
An opulent wand presented to heroes who have been recognized by royalty.
This wand was torn from the hands of a demon sorcerer and now stands firm against the mad god.
A simple stone wand that seems to grow stronger as it is taken further into the depths of the earth.
A wand that leads to the centre of creation, the misled followers of its path find only a pulsating void within.
A monstrous wand that seemingly thirsts for its next blooded victim.
The wand used by the dark mages to guide their malefic summons into this world.
A wand with the power to ignite whatever it touches.
One of the later prototypes for a wand designed to conduct great forces of energy onto its target.
A menacing aura flows from the ruby seated at the top of this wand, ready to quell any dissension.
A wand of demonic enigmas, cloaked in darkness and crackling with dark enchantments.
The wand gives of a beautiful shine when exposed to the star filled sky.
A handcrafted cane used by the village elder of an ancient Aldridge town.
Seemingly made from a normal plant but when held exerts a beautiful green glow and whispers can be heard.
A corrupt wyvern's tail still holding onto the cursed magic bestowed upon by an evil mage.
Used by elder lowland mages, this wand spreads misery and pestilence.
This wand is known in legends for the fact that it doubles as a dagger if enemies get too close. Luckily with its innate magical power, that almost never comes to pass.
A wand that compresses water into an absurdly deadly explosive.
A well used dagger now dusty and worn with age.
The work of a skilled blacksmith this dagger will serve you well.
An opulent dagger presented to heroes who have been recognized by royalty.
This dagger was torn from the hands of a demon assassin and now stands firm against the mad god.
A uniquely long dagger unfit for stealthy attacks. Its great size serves to unnerve opponents.
The humble glinting blade wielded by the puppet master in his final act.
A shank carried around by those who wander the haunted locker of Davy Jones.
Made from the remains of the Cube God, its oblate blade spreads a caustic acid.
A blade coated in ivy that seems to ooze a virulent sap.
A phantasmic whip used by those that would seek to control the sprites.
A crystal dagger sharpened to a cruel edge by the illusionist during his trial within the crypt.
{equip.A_deadly_dagger_of_glittering_magical_emerald.}
A sharp metallic shiv coated in a mysterious purple liquid from far below the realm.
A sweet scent of honey rises from the blade as its sharp tip pierces the skin...
An otherworldly blade haunted by a wisp with cruel intentions for anything it touches.
A poison coated blade found within a jungles depths hidden from man's touch.
A gauntlet infused with ice that rends flesh and freezes blood.
Crackling with godly energy, this dagger cuts at the very essence of its unlucky victims.
The unique design of the blade allows this dagger to enter easily and exit violently.
A well used cloak now dusty and worn with age.
The work of a skilled seamstress this cloak will serve you well.
An opulent cloak presented to heroes who have been recognized by royalty.
This cloak was torn from the body of a rogue demon and now stands firm against the mad god.
A cloak worn by many celestial beings to stay hidden from the sight of humans.
A permanent sandstorm veils the user in a protective shroud.
A cloak fashioned from the glowing hides of the illusory beasts that dominate the halls of the great crypt.
A cloak forever burning, concealing the wearer in a thick shroud of smoke.
A reflective cloak that seems to be encased in an otherworldly fog.
A cloak formed by thousands of lighting bolts that protect the user from danger.
A gown that once represented royalty, now stained with grief and shame.
Clouded by a dark mist, this cloak is said to be used by the Grim Reaper when collecting souls
Carefully crafted, this mirror laden cloak allows light to bend around the user.
An enchanted cloak woven of vines, ferns, and other plants. Elves use these to hide in plain sight while observing the 'lesser' races.
A well used prism now dusty and worn with age.
The work of a skilled jeweler this prism will serve you well.
An opulent prism presented to heroes who have been recognized by royalty.
This prism was torn from the hands of a demon trickster and now stands firm against the mad god.
A crimson jewel, its brilliance flashes with wrath and blood.
A gem presented to those of remarkable talent and accomplishment.
The visions within this gem have led many warriors astray.
Beneath the sands of the desert, lay the gems brighter than any other that hold this prism together.
Teleporting between enemies with such speed is only possible through the power of Ventus.
A prism cursed by the hellish powers of Malgor.
A glass globe encasing the spectre within, protecting the realm from eternal demise.
A topaz gem blessed by anubis himself said to curse whoever tries to remove it from its frame.
The Golden Heart of King Midas himself.
A prism that once belonged to a demon. It emits a faint heat when held.
A well used helm now dusty and worn with age.
The work of a skilled armorer this helm will serve you well.
An opulent helm presented to heroes who have been recognized by royalty.
This helm was torn from the body of a demon berserker and now stands firm against the mad god.
A helmet worn by a corrupted warrior, driven to madness by the horrors within the tunnels.
Made from the hard shell of the hermit god, the wearer hears the reverberation of the ocean.
A helm forged within the consuming dark worn by warriors of true shadow.
A helm that strengthens the senses and gives the user endless confidence. No human or god can resist its maddening empowerment for long.
Given to those recognised enough within the halls to symbolise their prestige.
A worn helm found within the deepest burial site of the catacombs.
A neccessary helmet for going out to space.
There is plenty of fun in having fun with the fun you'll have with a fun hat!
This gold crested helm belonged to a long lost lord who united his kingdom under his own twisted ideal of wealth. Siphons blood from the user to empower them, though this is rarely noticeable.
A helmet used by a troop of angels that followed Oryx in his rise to power, tempted by promises of great rewards.
A well used shield now dusty and worn with age.
The work of a skilled armorer this shield will serve you well.
An opulent shield presented to heroes who have been recognized by royalty.
This shield was torn from the hands of a demon enforcer and now stands firm against the mad god.
The oversized shields wielded by the knights guarding oryx's chamber.
A tiki shield made from the elder bark of the grand totem.
No attack can penetrate this shield, it was made to withstand the deadliest blows.
A shield, cold to the touch like the gargoyles heart, a trophy worth keeping.
A shield entrusted to the marble defender that he may prevent access to the colossus.
A shield that will shock enemies on contact!
A rusty shield found concealed within a desert temple beneath the sand rusting away it's true colours.
A shield imprisoning a garnet within its centre, the glistening jewel praising its user.
A silver engraved heater shield used by esteemed officers of a secretive northern empire. What it's made out of isn't understood, but it's nigh indestructible.
A hardwood shield dripping with cursed sap. Spreads decay and death to whatever it touches.
Well used dice now dusty and worn with age.
The work of a skilled craftsman these dice will serve you well.
Opulent dice presented to heroes who have been recognized by royalty.
Nobody knows why a demon was carrying these dice, they now stand firm against the mad god.
A prisoner's final gamble.
A die used exclusively for the high-stakes games of royal gamblers.
The puppet master never lost a fair game... nor did he ever play one.
A gambling tool from long ago, the old glyphs are too worn to read.
A small charm found within the maw of an apex predator, it seems fortune played no part in the fate of this creature.
Devilish Dice that whisper lies into the minds of the user.
A dice imbued with the power written in the ancient Aldridge language leaving it's tale, a mystery left to unfold.
A gold forged dice used to gamble away morale during the dark ages for Aldridge, a memorabilia not to be lost.
Enchanted to bring misery, this dice is rarely employed by spies and saboteurs to cripple their enemy.
A rigged dice that always gives the user the outcome they desire.
A well used seal now dusty and worn with age.
The work of a skilled bishop this seal will serve you well.
An opulent seal presented to heroes who have been recognized by royalty.
This seal was torn from the hands of a felpaladin and now stands firm against the mad god.
A seal with the power to open the heavens and reign destruction on all who dare defy its power.
A seal counting down the days until the apocalypse.
A gift from poseidon, the seal grants mastery over water.
A seal that calls upon the power of the penteract, any paladin that uses it has betrayed their order.
A seal with the power to command life itself.
A paladin's seal crafted of hellstone, its very existence seems blasphemous.
A seal bound in rock from eons past, its strength resembles that of the founding paladins.
A seal held by the cosmic beings above the realm, how did it get here?
This seal spreads a protective barrier of water to its user and those nearby, while warding off foes.
A blood seal that eats away at the soul of anything nearby to grant cursed power to its user.
A well used flask of poison now dusty and worn with age.
The work of a skilled alchemist this poison will serve you well.
An opulent flask of poison presented to heroes who have been recognized by royalty.
This poison was torn from the hands of a demon assassin and now stands firm against the mad god.
The sinister implement of both an entertainer and an assassin.
A small pot overflowing with the deadly venom of the snake pit.
The remains of a ghostly king, banished from his haunted tomb.
A cursed poison concocted from the blood of the betrayed sculptors of the avatar.
The angelic tears within this bottle can purge evil and strengthen oneself.
Taken from the void pool of the entity himself, it still flows with his power.
An alchemist's mixture seeming to become more virulent with each remorseless soul it claims.
Toughly sealed within this vial, this venom is said to burn through the toughest of substances.
Encased in a reinforced clay vessel, this liquid could melt through solid rock in seconds.
A toxin that melts flesh from bone, then evaporates the puddle that's left behind.
A well used tome now dusty and worn with age.
The work of a skilled priestess this tome will serve you well.
An opulent tome presented to heroes who have been recognized by royalty.
This tome was torn from the hands of a demon vilepriest and now stands firm against the mad god.
A journal of all the experiments carried out within the laboratory.
Used during the burial of pharaohs to make sure they reached the afterworld safely.
The sacred texts of an alien race from an alternate timeline, their gods hold influence over spacetime itself.
A guidebook upon the many denizens of the abyssal depths.
A tome containing the folklore and history of an atlantean society.
A tome of ancient psalms said to calm the gods and keep them at rest.
The immense power surging from this tome shatters the very ground beneath you.
A holy relic from King Alexander said to possess the power of the heavens within his palms.
A tome with a darksteel binding. Words of prayer from this tome both reinforce and heal the body.
A ceremonial tome twisted to harm those that hear its verses.
A well used spell now dusty and worn with age.
The work of a skilled arcanist this spell will serve you well.
An opulent spell presented to heroes who have been recognized by royalty.
This spell was torn from the hands of a demon mage and now stands firm against the mad god.
An ingenious spell that efficiently consumes magic power by duplicating one arcane blast many times over.
A spell that bathes the target in a searing heat.
A fabled scroll containing the Twilight Archmage's greatest incantations. Its dichotomic power can freeze solid the very things it incinerates.
A tapestry granted magical properties by the Elemental Phantom.
A spell with the power to control the sacred all-flame.
Old passages that detail a spell capable of controlling the fiery brimstone of hell.
A spell so potent, any soul it targets gets overwhelmed by its strength, immobilizing them for eternity.
Once a tablet of medicinal power but now is overrun by a unwelcome force creating nothing but fear.
A slab of rock etched with an age old spell to turn flesh to stone.
A spell tablet used during an attempt by angels to prevent Oryx from rising to power. They failed, but what they've left behind are truly powerful artifacts.
A well used jacket now dusty and worn with age.
The work of a skilled clothier this jacket will serve you well.
An opulent jacket presented to heroes who have been recognized by royalty.
This jacket was torn from the body of a demon blademaster and now stands firm against the mad god.
The decaying remains of tridorno were used as threads to keep bind this cursed mail together.
Fashioned from the remains of the gargoyle's wings, the heavy jacket grants protection at the cost of mobility.
A crude and heavy jacket woven from old chainmail, its iron rings will protect the user well.
A beautifully sewn coat lined with bright pink gems.
Encases the wearer in an icy storm that aids in the evasion of attacks.
Constant screams can be heard from those who perished in the infernal flames.
An old cloth falling apart from old age, it's power still looms within in the magnificent fabrics woven together.
Passed Down through many generations of Blademasters, this jacket has never been cleaned to hold the memories of their fallen victims.
The material of this vest occasionally shows windows into the afterlife.
The protege has surpassed the master.
A well used orb now dusty and worn with age.
The work of a skilled glassblower this orb will serve you well.
An opulent orb presented to heroes who have been recognized by royalty.
This orb was torn from the hands of a demon shaman and now stands firm against the mad god.
A softly churning orb that encapsulates the soothing undulations of the ocean.
A volatile lava plume dances within the crystalline orb.
Staring into the orb freezes the soul and calms the mind.
A glass orb holding nature sealed within it, fragile yet dangerous.
A strange lantern-like object that contains a wobbling orb of blood lighting up the room.
A darksome, garnet orb that steals weeks of life from those who peer into its core.
An orb given to the people of the realm upon their arrival, seemingly watching our every move.
An amethyst orb set upon its base, the twinkling light appears to come from within.
An obsidian orb holding the eternal fury of a god.
A black crystal orb containing the remnants of a holy god.
A well used quiver now dusty and worn with age.
The work of a skilled craftswoman this quiver will serve you well.
An opulent quiver presented to heroes who have been recognized by royalty.
This quiver was torn from the body of a demon archer and now stands firm against the mad god.
Crafted by the reticent centaurs of the deep forest, these enchanted arrows are coated in a faintly glowing moss.
A quiver from beyond, brought back on the mothership by alien rangers.
A quiver containing iron arrows used by the King's archers, the method through which they are forged now lost to time.
A quiver worn by the mechanical warlords on their conquests of other worlds.
A phantom quiver corrupted with the dark power of zol, its deathly bolts strike fear.
An ironwood quiver used by harbinger elves to relay messages of impending destruction and ruin.
An endless quiver handed down by the gods to the best archers in the realm to thank them for their service..
This Quiver holds arrows laced with medusa venom, normal quivers would break apart from touching even the slightest drop.
More of a cannon than a quiver, this contraption fires concentrated starlight.
A quiver that holds reinforced bronze arrows. These were given to commanders of great valor in a long lost age.
A well used trap now dusty and worn with age.
The work of a skilled huntress this trap will serve you well.
An opulent trap presented to heroes who have been recognized by royalty.
This trap was torn from the hands of a demonhunter and now stands firm against the mad god.
The elegance of nature seems to flourish in this radiant flower.
An oozing trap made thick with coagulated blood.
An array of these traps has been laid out to protect the sunken city.
A dark ornament, pilfered from the centre of the chest that traps the forbidden god.
A putrid trap used by sincryer's minions to prevent access to his throne.
A poor soul that was enslaved within the creed, it seems grateful to be free.
A unique trap that contains the empowering vapors of the grand dragon Healianth.
There's only one way you're gonna catch the devil, stand close to the detonation site for a bloody reward.
A trap used by spirit hunters, made with materials that extend its reach into the realm of the beyond.
This frightening gem that attracts blood is used as a makeshift trap that rips fluids out through the target's skin.
A well used shuriken now dusty and worn with age.
The work of a skilled shinobi this shuriken will serve you well.
An opulent shuriken presented to heroes who have been recognized by royalty.
This shuriken was torn from the hands of an oni and now stands firm against the mad god.
A cruel kunai forged from the knucklebones of lost warriors within the catacombs.
A star that leaves no mark on the flesh but takes life's through other means.
The sharp teeth of the snakes has been forged into a stealthy and deadly weapon.
A star used to fetch the souls residing within hell itself.
An insidious weapon that attacks not only its target but their descendants as well.
A ninja star that seeks out the vitals of its target.
A brilliant star forged from a solar flare, it's light showing no signs of diminishing soon.
A reflective steel star that seems to get heavier with every throw from the user.
A Shuriken of alien origin, it cuts on a molecular level.
Clouds of dust drift from this stone throwing star. The weight behind each throw lends it abnormally high penetration.
A well used banner now dusty and worn with age.
The work of a skilled seamstress this banner will serve you well.
An opulent banner presented to heroes who have been recognized by royalty.
This banner was torn from the handsof a demonic standard-bearer and now stands firm against the mad god.
A bolt of blue cloth rests along the golden frame, it's said it glows when close to home.
A dark crusader's standard. The flag is a patchwork of the nations his army has conquered.
A holy banner held to keep the immortal nosferatu at bay.
A banner emblazoned with a grand symbol of courage. A testament to the will of a templar.
A brilliant relic entrusted to the great commanders capable of leading their armies through the halls.
A banner signifying the future return of revil to claim victory over those who disturbed him.
A banner painted with the emblems of those that participated in the wars sworn to be forgotten
A golden banner lined with tapestries from a faraway kingdom gifted on behalf of our treaty.
A banner from a secretive northern empire. Holders of this banner inspire their allies enough that even the weakest of mind and body can become the greatest of heroes.
Used by crusaders when sieging Oryx's castle, this legendarily powerful banner was deployed in the event that the mad god himself was spotted.
A well used skull now dusty and worn with age.
The work of a skilled necromancer this skull will serve you well.
An opulent skull presented to heroes who have been recognized by royalty.
This skull was torn from the hands of a demon necromancer and now stands firm against the mad god.
The skull of an immortal on whom exorcisms were practiced.
The remains of the serpent?s corpse after being broken down by its own venom.
An enchanted tiki head, a primal power surges within its bearer.
A hollowed out skull dripping with acid, fatal to anything that isn't wary.
The skull of a great demon, its evil intent still can be felt.
A demon's head enchanted to siphon power from its foes.
A skull used for stealing the souls from innocents to be used in rituals, named for the oddly fast onset of decay that this catalyst causes.
A well used sheath now dusty and worn with age.
The work of a skilled samurai this sheath will serve you well.
An opulent sheath presented to heroes who have been recognized by royalty.
This sheath was torn from the hands of a demon samurai and now stands firm against the mad god.
A venomous sheath taken from the acidic corpse of the beast, it once belonged to an adventurer.
A sheath forged from the blazing heart of the Molten Construct.
An unusual sheath, capable of sharpening any blade that is held within it through the use of alien technology.
A sheath woven out of crocodile skin, many use it instead of a weapon.
The housing of a weapon with inevitable purpose, slice through the strings of fate to achieve what is rightfully yours.
Most sheaths simply hide a blade within, this one hides its dark intentions...
A scribes blade hidden behind a sealed sheath to protect the user from its runes calling for vengeance against its creator.
A spiritual sheath that tempers the mind of its wielder.
A magmatic sheath bubbling with the earth's fury.
ReZero is a pretty good anime.
A crown only fit for a god...
